Function.Description: The stringCiEQ function performs a case-insensitive comparison between two Strings and determines whether both Strings are equal or not. A Boolean value is returned.

Brief.Overview: The stringCiEQ function performs a case-insensitive comparison between the two strings {string1} and {string2}. If the comparison is true, true is returned; otherwise, false is returned.
Brief.Usage: Use the stringCiEQ function to compare if two Strings are equal without considering the case the of the Strings (case-insensitive). Therefore the Strings "Hello" and "HELLO" would compare equal.

Argument.Name: string1
Argument.Note: The first String or Text to be compared

Argument.Name: string2
Argument.Note: The second String or Text to be compared

Syntax.Return: Returns true if the comparison is true, false if the comparison is false
